t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: New To Brand Metrics
s: Thanks for the post. Brand Metrics help quantify opportunities for your brand at each stage of the customer journey on Amazon. They allow brands to understand the value of different shopping engagements that impact stages of that journey. You may view Brand Metrics in the Amazon Advertising console.
